title: At Winter Olympics, protest over cost and ICE ends in clash with police
summary_full: After left-wing groups rallied against the cost and environmental impact of the Winter Games in Italy, some protesters set off fireworks and hurled bottles.
summary_public: After left-wing groups rallied against the cost and environmental impact of the Winter Games in Italy, some protesters set off fireworks and hurled bottles.

IT.label: neutral
